title: DL-SCAN: Deep-Learning Cell Segmentation & Analysis
description: Published microscopy pipeline for deep-learning-based cell segmentation and intensity analysis to improve throughput and reproducibility.

title: DL-SCAN MCP: LLM-Triggered Batch Automation
description: MCP-based system that lets an LLM trigger and batch-run the DL-SCAN workflow via natural-language prompts, improving scalability and reproducibility.

title: Astrocyte Ion Dynamics: Spatiotemporal Modeling with NeuroMorpho Morphology
description: Python-based point and spatiotemporal astrocyte ionic homeostasis model using compartmental morphology data (NeuroMorpho.org) and generating CSV outputs for ion concentrations, currents, and branch/compartment distance mappings.

title: Computational Drug Development using ML
description: QSAR-style ML workflow using molecular representations, feature extraction/selection, and supervised learning to predict compound activity metrics.

title: Dialog-to-JSON Structuring
description: Pipeline to convert conversational and clinical dialogue text (e.g., providerâ€“patient interactions and EHR-derived notes) into structured JSON for downstream analytics, clinical data integration, and decision support workflows.

title: LangChain RAG / LLM App Experiments
description: Prototypes exploring retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), chaining, and tool-using LLM application patterns with LangChain.

title: LLM for Medical Transcription
description: NLP/LLM pipeline for transforming medical transcription and clinical documentation into structured representations suitable for EHR integration, clinical summarization, and downstream healthcare analytics.

title: n8n Agentic Workflow Automation
description: Agentic automation workflows built in n8n to orchestrate multi-step tasks, integrate tools/APIs, and generate structured outputs.

title: n8n Data Analyst Agent
description: An n8n-based data analyst agent for ingesting data, running transformations, and producing LLM-assisted summaries and insights.

media.alt: n8n data analyst agent demo GIF

title: AWS SageMaker + EC2 + S3 ML Pipeline
description: End-to-end workflow for EDA, feature engineering, model training/optimization, and artifact management using AWS SageMaker with EC2 and S3.

title: Loan Approval Prediction Pipeline
description: End-to-end loan approval ML pipeline with preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and deployment-ready structure for scalable decisioning.

title: MLOps Toolkit & Experiments
description: Hands-on MLOps work using Docker, DVC, and CI/CD patterns to make model training and deployment reproducible.

title: Modular ML Framework
description: A modular codebase for reusable ML components (data prep, training, evaluation) to speed up experimentation and maintainability.

title: SQL Portfolio
description: A collection of SQL queries and exercises covering joins, aggregations, window functions, and practical analytics patterns.

title: Power BI Projects
description: Dashboards and reporting work using Power BI, Power Query, and Power Automate - showcasing KPI design, interactive visuals, and business-focused insights (with SQL/ETL support).

title: Spotify Recommender System
description: Streamlit-based music recommender integrating Spotify API and ML similarity (e.g., KNN) to generate personalized recommendations.
